summary.overallFindings: Booking Holdings Inc. demonstrates comprehensive and well-documented responsible AI practices across all seven pillars. The company provides detailed public evidence of transparency, fairness, explainability, human oversight, privacy, governance, and external audit through sustainability reports, codes of conduct, and product documentation. Their approach includes regular audits, bias mitigation, explainable AI features, and robust privacy and security controls. Overall, Booking Holdings sets a strong example for responsible AI in the travel technology sector.
